public abstract class zeta.form.ListForm

(source file: ListForm.pizza)
java.lang.Object

   +----zeta.form.Form

           +----zeta.form.ListForm
The pure class interface. 
public abstract class ListForm
  extends Form
The abstract class of list forms.

A list form represents a variable collections of items where a selection can be made from.

Author:
Wolfgang Grieskamp (wg@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: ListForm.pizza,v 1.6 2000/05/14 17:43:32 wg Exp $

ListForm(State)
Create a new list form.

state
The state of the list form.
style
The style of the list form.

parse(Session, Locator, String[], int)
style(Style)
Attach a style to this list form
unparse(Session)

The abstract class of list form states.

The class of styles of list forms.
